Steps.Description: Stealth Rock as it switches into a Scarfed Claydol, then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent uses Gyro Ball, switch to Poliwrath
if Lapras comes out, Belly Drum. if Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you then use Ice Punch on Vileplume
if opponent swaps to Vileplume, switch to Blissey and use Trick
if opponent does not swap out, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance
if opponent switches out into Dewgong while you are setting up, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum. if Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you (use Drain Punch), then use Ice Punch on Vileplume
if opponent switches out into Lapras comes out, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum. if Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you (use Belly Drum), then use Ice Punch on Vileplume
if opponent switches out into Dewgong, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum. if Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you (use Belly Drum), then use Ice Punch on Vileplume
if opponent switches out into Chansey, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if Mantine comes out, swap into Metagross and Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock;
switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Experimental: if Fire Punch does less than 47%, use Thunder Punch and then swap to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches to Golduck, switch to Poliwrath then switch into second Metagross. Use Trick as Lapras comes out to lock in Drill Run. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Lapras
and you get an Expert Belt, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind
if opponent used Waterfall, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
and you get a Rocky Helmet, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Nidoking, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Lapras, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Slowbro, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure
if opponent stays, 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Dragonite, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Then switch back to Chandelure  3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Vileplume, switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick and then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed (scarfed Claydol)
Use Trick;
if you get a Leftovers, use Stealth Rock and switch into Blissey, then use Trick as Lucario switches in. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get an Expert Belt;
and it uses Flamethrower, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
and it uses Fire Punch, use Stealth Rock and switch into Blissey, then use Trick as Lucario switches in. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick and then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Warning.Description: Don't use Energy Ball against Mantine

Steps.Description: Use Trick;
if opponent stays, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock;
if opponent switches out into Exeggutor, switch to Chandelure and then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Warning.Description: Don't use Energy Ball against Mantine

Steps.Description: if opponent switches out into Lapras, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Exeggutor, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Lapras, use Stealth Rock;
if opponent uses Aqua Tail, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Drill Run, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

if opponent uses Drill Run, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Steps.Description: if opponent switches into Mantine, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled;
if opponent switches into Lapras, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Golduck, switch to Chandelure then switch back to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Lapras, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Exeggutor, switch into Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent Surf, switch into Poliwrath: X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent switches into Dragonite, switch into 2nd Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Poliwrath: X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent uses Hydro Pump;
and you get a Life Orb, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
and you get a Choice Specs, use Stealth Rock and then switch into Poliwrath: X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent switches into Dragonite, switch into 2nd Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Poliwrath: X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent switches into Chansey, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch into Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Mantine, switch into Blissey and then into 2nd Metagross and use Trick.

if it switches into Chansey, switch into Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it switches into Vileplume, switch into Chandelure, then into 2nd Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure: 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed

and opponent uses Drain Punch, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
and opponent uses Dynamic Punch, use Stealth Rock; (Dynamic Punch inflicts confusion)
if you're able to set Stealth Rock without dying, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if first Metagross dies, switch to second Metagross, use Stealth Rock and proceed to switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

if opponent switches into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent into Salamence

if opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses Hammer Arm, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Salamence, switch to Blissey and use Trick
if opponent stays, use Softboiled as Metagross comes out. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches back to Metagross, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

if opponent switches out into Salamence

if opponent stays, switch again to Blissey and use Stealth Rock

if opponent switches out into Krookodile, switch to Excadrill then switch to Metagross Trick. Switch back to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use Swords Dance + X.Speed

if opponent uses Drain Punch, switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

if opponent switches into Salamence again,switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

if opponent switches out into Machamp, use Trick

if opponent uses Payback, Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Metagross, use Trick
